inclusion.criterion: Children who admitted to the Neonatal intensive care unit and/or those who were born at the obstetrics unit
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: obstetrics unit and followed up with their mothers between January 2006 - December 2008
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: reevaluated at school age (5-7 years old) during the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who come to the school-age assessment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who did not come to the school-age assessment
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 39-year-old man with a history of asthma and seasonal allergic rhinitis, currently using ICS and fluticasone. Symptoms improve outside work.
